title: Weekly Digest (5 July, 2020 - 12 July, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 28 issues were created.
Of these, 12 issues have been closed and 16 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #10939 [Logcat grep, new templates e2e fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10939), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10938 [[keycard] Rename all "hardwallet" occurencies to "keycard"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10938), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #10937 [[WIP] [#10179] Create invite link for group chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10937), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10936 [Nim-Status: iOS support](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10936), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:green_heart: #10935 [[WIP] ios pn](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10935), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10930 [bump status-react-jenkins to 1.2.0](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10930), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #10928 [Blocked users are not shown in Profile > Contacts in case when contact list is empty](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10928), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10925 [WIP Lists performance experiment](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10925), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #10924 [Can't open "Network fee" validation error on Sending screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10924), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10923 [fix tokens validation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10923), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10922 [Two tokens (Flexacoin and FUTURAX) is checked and unchecked at the same time in "Wallet" -> "Manage assets"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10922), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #10921 [Validation error is overlaid on the password field during creating new account in Wallet and blocking user to correct password](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10921), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
:green_heart: #10919 [No welcome screen after pairing keycard ('Recover from keycard' flow)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10919), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10915 [Merge password screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10915), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #10914 [Chat header of current user is shown in case of opening PN from another user if app was on background with 1-1 chat with current user](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10914), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10912 [WIP: Add reactions picker UI](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10912), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #10934 [[#10880] Expanded view with public chat categories](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10934), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10933 [Update scroll to element](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10933), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #10932 [Pairing e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10932), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #10931 [upgrade shadow](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10931), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10929 [Quo left over components in ens screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10929), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10927 [[#10784] Fix kk multiacc creation after closing app](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10927), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10926 [Update ethro key in e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10926), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #10920 [[keycard] Allow to restore kk multiacc using pairing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10920), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10918 [Fix keycard e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10918), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #10917 [Can't block a user](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10917), by [KyleNie](https://github.com/KyleNie)
:heart: #10916 [Followup fixes after Quo integration](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10916), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10913 [chill stickers](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10913), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #10922 [Two tokens (Flexacoin and FUTURAX) is checked and unchecked at the same time in "Wallet" -> "Manage assets"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10922), by [qoqobolo](https://github.com/qoqobolo)
It received :+1: x3, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #10923 [fix tokens validation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10923), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
It received 13 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 33 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 15 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #10939 [Logcat grep, new templates e2e fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10939), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)

:yellow_heart: #10873 [WIP: New ui for chat input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10873), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10810 [[WIP] audio messages](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10810), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #10703 [WIP: Add identicon into profile qr code](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10703), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #10620 [WIP Add referral share link ui](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10620), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 18 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #10934 [[#10880] Expanded view with public chat categories](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10934), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)

:purple_heart: #10686 [Use interactive components from Quo](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10686), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

Last week there were 21 commits.

:hammer_and_wrench: [drop all desktop related files and references  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/112132aa94267be6a6b1050e1806ff3a65bafd48) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)

Now on every interaction the full list is re-rendered, also it makes the wallet main screen to re-render.  Fix send sheet  Handle long press in main thread  UI fixes  perf  Update e2e  fix missing user name in image long press  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/497af38a7fbd87f1efa466ef1d2a8663f7c1bc6d) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

Last week there were no releases.
